descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the relationship between caloric intake and energy expenditure.
Demonstrates a limited understanding of caloric intake and energy expenditure.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of caloric balance, but struggles to apply it to real-life scenarios.
Demonstrates a solid understanding of caloric balance and its impact on weight management.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of caloric balance and can apply it to create personalized health plans.
Demonstrates an expert understanding of caloric balance and can explain it effectively to others, incorporating nuanced factors.
Shows no awareness of the nutritional content of different food groups.
Shows limited awareness of the nutritional content of different food groups.
Identifies the main nutrients in common food groups, but cannot explain their roles.
Understands the main nutrients in common food groups and can explain their roles in maintaining health.
Demonstrates in-depth knowledge of the nutritional content of a wide variety of foods and can make informed dietary choices.
Demonstrates expert knowledge and can analyze complex nutritional information, such as food labels, to optimize health.
Unable to identify different types of physical activity or their benefits.
Identifies a few types of physical activity but struggles to assess their intensity.
Identifies various types of physical activity and can estimate their intensity levels.
Can accurately assess the intensity and duration of different types of physical activity.
Can create personalized physical activity plans based on individual needs and goals.
Can design and lead physical activity programs for diverse populations, considering individual needs and safety.
Unable to apply the concepts to personal health choices.
Shows limited ability to connect the concepts to personal health.
Can identify some ways to improve personal health through diet and exercise.
Can create a basic plan to balance food intake and physical activity for personal health.
Can create a detailed and realistic plan, and can adapt it based on changing circumstances.
Consistently demonstrates healthy habits and serves as a role model for others.
